Today we present 3 new bonds, part of the Fliar Ethical Income that will benefit working women, good students and the poorest girls
27,000 poor women will receive a bonus equivalent to 15% of their salary for each month worked between April and December 2011.
270 thousand students between 5th grade and 4th grade, of the 15% with the best performance of their course, will receive an Academic Excellence bonus of $ 50 thousand
The third bonus is additional support for 143,000 vulnerable families who will receive an average of $ 40,000 this month.

Hello to everyone. In recent days I would like to share my views on some of the top topics.
I take care not to find a guiding booklet about the affairs that have been brought to justice.
However, this does not prevent us from commenting on some of the events that have troublingly socially disrupted our conscience.
The decision to approve the downloading of the penalty for what happened to your young child made me deeply disturbed.
As far as I know, the trial process is not finished; there is still the possibility of appeal. I hope to bring a conclusion that will calm the public conscience.
In recent days, one of the most frequently asked questions has been asking me about my wage.
These questions are mainly due to some inaccurate news about the President's salary.
Because these reports knowingly or unknowingly reflect the gross wage as if the tax had been deducted from the net.
I would like everyone to know: almost half of the figure in the net salary of the next president after taxes are deducted.
Referring to the salary issue, I announce that I also joined a beautiful campaign launched after Van earthquake.
I agree by giving a salary to the campaign "A Salary Van" that many responsible politicians have joined.
I greet everyone, to see you again at the Feast of Sacrifice.

Today we sign a project that creates a new Telecommunications Superintendence: quality and lower prices in Telephony, Internet and Television.
Tomorrow we will end the national long distance charge within the regions of Los Lagos and Los Ríos, thus completing 7 regions.
This year we will enact the Antenna Law to regulate its installation and better protect the health of people and the neighborhood environment.
Our commitment is that before the end of 2012, the national long distance charge for the whole country will be completely eliminated.
Added to this is the portability of the telephone number, both mobile and fixed, which will belong to the users and not to the telephone companies.

Today, together with our athletes who competed in Guadalajara 2011, we signed the bill that creates the Ministry of Sport.
We congratulate you for your great effort and for winning 43 medals: the best mark of a Chilean delegation in the history of the Pan American Games.
The Ministry of Sport will work to make Chile a healthier country physically and mentally, through the promotion of all sports.
It will also support the organization of the X South American Games that will take place in Chile in 2014.

Yesterday the law that creates the Financial Sernac was approved, which establishes new rights for clients of financial institutions.
It includes, for example, the right to have all the relevant information of the financial services contracted to avoid abuses
And it sets new obligations for financial institutions, raising fines that can reach up to $ 30 million if there are abuses.
We thank the Minister of Economy, the Director of Sernac and all the parliamentarians who approved this great social project.

The PM will be making a Prime Ministerial statement on Afghanistan at 12:00 PM AEDT today. Watch it live here - http://t.co/7LnAF3eI TeamJG
PM: "Australia’s national interests in Afghanistan are unchanged - There must be no safe haven for terrorists in Afghanistan."
PM: "Working alongside the Afghan National Interdiction Unit, our Special Forces disrupt the narcotics trade."
PM: "Another example of our work in building Afghan security capacity is our work at the Afghan National Army Artillery Training School."
PM: "In Uruzgan Australians also work with the Afghan police to get them ready for transition."
PM: "Pakistan, its military and people, are on the frontline of terrorism and have been victims of its violence themselves."
PM: "It is time for Pakistan to do more to counter terrorism and extremism."
PM: "Over the next three years, Australia will complete our mission of training and transition. Australia will not abandon Afghanistan."
PM: "We know the good things we have done have come at a high cost. There have been days of sorrow and we do not forget."
PM: "We will defend our national interests. We will deny terrorism a safe haven in Afghanistan. We will complete our mission."

Today we present the winning project of the public tender to build a 64-hectare park around the National Stadium.
This work, a "Bicentennial Legacy" project, will have 28 hectares of green areas, 15,000 trees, a large lagoon and bicycle lanes.
This new park will benefit not only the neighbors of Ñuñoa, but also of Macul, San Joaquín, Stgo, Providencia, La Reina and Peñalolén.
The Bicentennial Legacy projects are destined to recover for people the public spaces that today are abandoned and damaged.
